argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mgpsumunsn.m | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mgpsumunsn.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | mgpsumunsn.r | |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) |
| 4 |  | mgpsumunsn.n | |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) |
| 5 |  | mgpsumunsn.i | |- ( ph -> I e. N ) |
| 6 |  | mgpsumunsn.a | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. N ) -> A e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | mgpsumz.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 8 |  | mgpsumz.0 | |- ( k = I -> A = .0. ) |
| 9 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ringmnd | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Mnd ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Mnd ) |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> R e. Mnd ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |

| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> .0. e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 15, 8 | #P_mgpsumunsn | |- ( ph -> ( M gsum ( k e. N |-> A ) ) = ( ( M gsum ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) |-> A ) ) .x. .0. ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 18 | 1, 13 | #P_mgpbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` M ) |

| 20 | 3, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> M e. CMnd ) |
| 21 |  | #P_diffi | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( N \ { I } ) e. Fin ) |
| 22 | 4, 21 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( N \ { I } ) e. Fin ) |
| 23 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) -> k e. N ) |
| 24 | 23, 6 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( N \ { I } ) ) -> A e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. k e. ( N \ { I } ) A e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 26 | 18, 20, 22, 25 | #P_gsummptcl | |- ( ph -> ( M gsum ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) |-> A ) ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 27 | 13, 2, 7 | #P_ringrz | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( M gsum ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) |-> A ) ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( ( M gsum ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) |-> A ) ) .x. .0. ) = .0. ) |
| 28 | 17, 26, 27 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( M gsum ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) |-> A ) ) .x. .0. ) = .0. ) |
| 29 | 16, 28 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( M gsum ( k e. N |-> A ) ) = .0. ) |
